product_name: Columbia Open Water EXS Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Columbia Open Water EXS Shirt features sun-protective fabric and cooling vents to keep you comfortable when you're out paddling. Lightweight polyester fabric provides UPF sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Mesh vents at the shoulder blades and along the back allow cooling airflow for excellent comfort on warm summer days. Single chest pocket. Closeout.
short_description: The Columbia Open Water EXS Shirt features sun-protective fabric and cooling vents to keep you comfortable when you're out paddling.
